description:
Access screws at angles up to 25 degrees, for work in tight spots. Light, reliable, and easy to get a hold of, these are just a few of the reasons that mechanics love 3-way Allan wrenches.

  • Glass fiber reinforced polymer centre
  • Hardened industrial tool steel bits
  • 4mm, 5mm, and 6mm hex wrenches with Ball driver® tips
  • Ergonomic design for great torque
name: Park Tool AWS-8 3-Way Ball Driver Hex Wrench 4/5/6mm
